articles.title: Horrifying solar storm sparked Geomagnetic storm! Red streak seen over Danish skies - HT Tech
articles.description: The terrifying solar storm which hit Earth on March 23 not only sparked a geomagnetic storm, but also caused a red streak of light to appear in the night sky.
